TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProfileProviderAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileProviderAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ProfileProviderAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 識別使用者設定檔屬性的設定檔提供者。

span.span: Identifies the profile provider for a user-profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來識別的自訂設定檔實作屬性的設定檔提供者。The class is used to identify the profile provider for a property of a custom profile implementation. 自訂設定檔實作是繼承自一個類別抽象類別，並定義使用者設定檔中的組態項目未指定的屬性。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element. 您可以指定自訂使用者設定檔使用的型別`inherits`應用程式，如下列範例所示的 Web.config 檔案中的組態項目的屬性。You can specify a custom type for the user profile using the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例定義一個類別，繼承自類別來建立自訂的設定檔。The following code example defines a class that inherits from the class to create a custom profile. 已在指定的自訂設定檔類型`inherits`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的組態項目的屬性。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string providerName) cil managed

param.name: providerName
param.span: 屬性設定檔提供者的名稱。

span.span: The name of the profile provider for the property.

summary.span: 建立一個 類別的新執行個體，並命名為指定的設定檔提供者名稱。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified profile provider name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來識別的自訂設定檔實作屬性的設定檔提供者。The class is used to identify the profile provider for a property of a custom profile implementation. 自訂設定檔實作是繼承自一個類別抽象類別，並定義使用者設定檔中的組態項目未指定的屬性。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例定義一個類別，繼承自類別來建立自訂的設定檔。The following code example defines a class that inherits from the class to create a custom profile. 已在指定的自訂設定檔類型`inherits`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的組態項目的屬性。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. 如需組態檔中指定自訂設定檔實作的範例，請參閱類別概觀。For an example of a configuration file that specifies a custom profile implementation, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]
